title: What typeface is this?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720180905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KW%20logo2_4094.jpg)

What typeface is used in this image need to recreate it for a sign. Thanks in advance.
author: NilesHogan

comments.content:
The 'kw' logo might be [Unita Plain](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720180905/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/unita/plain/).  
The rest of the text is some version of Futura.  
 - Herb
